modName: SILENT Skyrim - Quieter Interface - No More UI Cartoon Noises
summary: Imagine a version of Skyrim that doesn't fill your gameplay with cartoony 'BOINK' and 'CLUNK' noises when you cut some leather into strips, or hit someone with a critical hit.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/30877-1-1361985915.jpg[/img]
[size=5]Imagine a version of Skyrim that doesn't fill your gameplay with cartoony 'BOINK' and 'CLUNK' noises when you cut some leather into strips, or hit someone with a critical.

Behold! That fix has finally arrived.[/size][/center]

[size=3]I was asked by several people to make an all-in-one version of my previous small 'SILENT' mods, but this includes much more.
Extremely simple to install or to remove, simply copy the files into your SkyrimData folder.
(NMM works perfectly as well if you prefer)

No .esp's or anything, you can just paste the files and play.
In case you want to bring back any noise this mod silenced, it's as easy as removing any single file from where it was installed in[/size]
[size=4][...Skyrim\Data\Sound][/size]

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxitmingredientitm_nirnroot_lp[/color] - Nirnroot's ringing noise
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxmgkfireboltmag_firebolt_fail[/color] - Noise of any spell failing
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_sneakattack_01[/color] - Critical 'CLUNK' hit noise
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_startnewgame[/color] - Nordic screaming when you start a new game
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_levelup[/color] - Level-up noise
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_skill_increase[/color] - Skill level-up noise

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiskillstransitionupui_skills_transitionup_01[/color] - Perk menu [open/close]
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiskillstransitionupui_skills_transitionup_02[/color]

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_objective_new_01[/color] - Quest and objective noises
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuiui_objective_new_02
Soundfxuiui_objective_new_03
Soundfxuiui_quest_update[/color]

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuialchemyui_alchemy_createpoison_01[/color] - Alchemy crafting noises
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuialchemyui_alchemy_createpotion_01
Soundfxuialchemyui_alchemy_fail_01
Soundfxuialchemyui_alchemy_learneffect_01[/color]

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuienchantingui_enchanting_itemcreate_01[/color] - Enchanting crafting noises
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuienchantingui_enchanting_itemdestroy_01
Soundfxuienchantingui_enchanting_learneffect_01
Soundfxuienchantingui_enchantrecharge_01
Soundfxuienchantingui_enchantrecharge_02[/color]

[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_creategeneric_01[/color] - Smithing crafting noises
[color=#48D1CC]Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_creategeneric_02
Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_improvearmor_01
Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_improvearmor_02
Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_improveweapon_01
Soundfxuismithingui_smithing_improveweapon_02[/color]

[size=4][color=#48D1CC]Optional File: SILENT Bugs[/color][/size]
Completely mutes all insects in the game, done by request
(97 bug sound files, wtf Bethesda! I love variety but geez) xD
_________________
